resources.string: Knowledgeable iOS software engineer with 3 years of hands-on experience playing key role in development of key business applications as member of elite technical teams. Hands-on expertise in Swift, ReactJS, Redux, React Native, Storyboard, and Data Structures and Frameworks. History of success delivering outstanding results in fast-paced, deadline-driven TDD, DDD, and Agile Scrum environments.

I\'m a software engineer with 5 years of hands on experience working with react native, typesrcript, redux, styled-components and many more of the most known and used tools and framework for mobile and web development.
I\'m a faster leaner, with good communication and a team player. Getting stuff done is what I like to do everyday.
I\'m graduated at Estacio de Sa university in Information systems in 2020, and I\'m currently getting my Master\'s degree in Computer Science at Maharishi International University.
